## ECSW

Reduced-order model builders and utilities

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [rom.ecsw](rom.ecsw.qmd#skrom.rom.ecsw) | The `ecsw` folder implements Empirical Cubature Subset Weighting (ECSW) methods. |
